Erycis'ler cirkin isgalcileri gittigi icin mutlular. Sizi özellikle daha güzel bulmasalar da, en azindan varliginizi hassas sinirleri üzerinde daha az rahatsiz edici buluyorlar.
Haritalarin Sinirinin Ötesinde

Bazen kesif bir inanc sicramasi haline gelir rasyonel bir projeden ziyade bir umut ve cesaret jesti. Bu, hicbir kilavuzun, yer isaretinin, haritanin olmadigi gercek bir maceradir sadece daha önce kimsenin gitmedigi yerleri görme ve kesfetme istegi.
Orada bir yerde adini duydugunuz bir harabe var bu okyanusun uzak tarafinda, hatta belki de henüz kesfedilmemis baska okyanuslarin uzak tarafinda kayip bir harabe. Onu bulmak hic de kolay olmayacak ne bir isaret ne de bir isaret levhasi var. Size rehberlik edecek sadece ruhunuz ve bir denizcinin sansi olacak.
Gercek, yardimsiz kesif zamani. Sadece cesaretiniz ve bir gemiyle, kesfedilmemis denizlerde yatan $RegionName'deki harabeyi bulun.
Harabeyi bulun, $RegionName icinde. Hangi Harabenin dogru olduguna dair bir gösterge yoktur.
Yapilacak baska bir tavsiye yok.

Fena bir ödül degil, toz ve san! Ama belki de hazine yolculukta, riskte ve simdi hevesle eve dönen bir zamanlarin süpheci mürettebatinin gözlerindeydi. Ne olursa olsun, yolculugunuzun masallara ve türkülere konu olacagina hic süphe yok!
Ahlaksiz Bir Aclik

Denizler yavas yavas sirlarini verdikce, imparatorlugunuzdaki pek cok kisi daha fazla güc ve daha hizli genisleme icin bastirmaya baslar. (Neden olmasin? Bu sulu genisliklerin bir hükümdari yok ve siz de egemenliginizi ilan edebilirsiniz. Kaynaklari eninde sonunda birine ait olacak ve en iyi aday da sizsiniz.
Yeni bir okyanus bölgesini fethedin.
$InitialSunkenRuinRegionName'den farkli herhangi bir okyanus bölgesini fethedin.
Kontrolü ele gecirmek icin Bölgedeki tüm Kaleleri kontrol edin.

Siz genisleyen kralliginizi incelerken geminizin yumusak salinimi bir ninni gibi. Belki de daha iyi bir unvana ihtiyaciniz vardir. Denizlerin Efendisi mi? Derinliklerin Tanri-Krali? Kararlar, kararlar...
X ile isaretlenmistir

Tipki bazi harabelerin daha büyük hazineler barindirmasi gibi, bazi tesisler de daha güclü mekanizmalar barindirir. Kaynak cikarmak veya tarim yapmaktan daha fazlasi icin özel olarak insa edilen benzersiz tesisler, cok degerli teknoloji veya üretim merkezleri olabilir.
Haritada bir yerlerde sömürülmeye hazir benzersiz bir tesis var - ve seyahat etmekten yorulmus yasli bir deniz tuzu size bir harita verdi. Auriga'nin zengin sirlarini daha fazla arastirmanin zamani geldi!
Eski denizcinin haritasinda gösterilen Essiz Tesisi bulun. Bu Tesisler standart Kale karolarindan daha degerli mucizeler icerir.
$TargetFortressRegionName'te bulunan $TargetFortressName benzersiz tesisin kontrolünü ele gecirin.
Toz isini haritanizdaki tam konumu gösterir.
Her zaman oldugu gibi, bu essiz tesis standart bir kaleden daha degerli ekipman ve yetenekler saglar. Auriga'nin harikalarinin her katmanini soydugunuzda, bir baskasi ortaya cikiyor gibi görünüyor...

1 Batisfer
Kale, imparatorlugunuz tarafindan isgal edilecek ve faydalarini saglayacak ve size 1 Batisfer biriminden olusan bir ordu verilecektir.
Orada bir sey var...

"Bir kükreme... dalgalarin gürültüsü ve cürüyen balik kokusu... sonra gemi kayboldu!"
Derin maviliklerde bir canavar oldugu bildirildi. Vahsi gözlü denizciler onun büyük gemiler, hatta adalar büyüklügünde oldugunu iddia ediyor. Saldiriya ugramis ve hatta yaralanmis ama asla öldürülmemis. Büyük bir ceneye bagli bir dokunaclar yigini olan bu masallardan gelen tek iyi haber, görünüse göre sadece bir tane oldugu - ama gezgin oldugu ve herhangi bir yerde ortaya ciktigi, saldirmak ve beslenmek icin aniden derinliklerden yükseldigi.
Gezgin Klanlar ona Muumang, Atesli Büyücüler Durxeri, Morgawrlar ise Gelysbyr diyor. Adi ne olursa olsun, hakkinda cok sayida hikâye vardir ve gemiler üzerinde kirilmistir, birkac kit gercek disinda cok az sey bilinmektedir. Birincisi, eger ölürse, onlarca yildir yuttugu tonlarca zenginligi sonunda kusacaktir. Ikincisi, herhangi bir parcasi hayatta kalirsa, kendini yenileyecektir. Ücüncüsü, muhtemelen daha büyük bir tekneye ihtiyaciniz var.

Deniz havasindan etkilenmeyen Deniz Canavari, derinliklerden görünmez bir sekilde yükselen korkunc bir yikici güctür! Yapabilirseniz öldürün ve karnindaki zenginligi alin. Ancak onu tamamen öldüremezseniz, yeniden canlanacak ve geri dönecektir...
Deniz Canavarini o sizi bulmadan bulun ve onu öldürerek (zengin) bir kahraman olun. Canavar en son $RegionName'de görüldü, ancak hareketleri tahmin edilebilir degil.
Deniz Canavari, macera haritasinda yalnizca bir Birimin tespit menzili icinde görülebilen bir su alti birimidir. Savasta dokunaclarina dikkat et!
Kanli ama boyun egmemis filonuz Auriga'daki en büyük deniz felaketini yendi! Bu korkunc seyin bagirsaklarini yagmalamanin ve bu kadar zorlukla kazanilan ganimeti almanin zamani geldi.

Unutulmus Ask
Irjsko Lasmak ve Bayari Kulaa'yi kahraman kadrosuna ekler. Bu icerik Make War Not Love 4 topluluk etkinligini kutlamak icin acildi.

Savas, tek bir insandan bütün bir halka kadar her sey üzerinde güclü ve yikici bir etkiye sahip olabilir. Daha da yakindan bakildiginda, ülkeler catismaya girdiginde bir bireyin umutlarinin ve arzularinin acimasizca büyük makinelerin carklari altinda ezildigi zamanlar vardir. Böyle zamanlarda, kisinin niyeti ya da kökeni ne olursa olsun, ask degil savas yapmaktan baska secenegi yoktur...
Komutan Irjsko Lasmak
Komutan Irjsko Lasmak II
Komutan Irjsko Lasmak III
Komutan Irjsko Lasmak

Uzun bir gecmisi olan bir ailenin hirsli ve yetenekli cocuklarindan biri olan Irjsko, Mezari güvenlik güclerinin saflarinda kolayca yükseldi. Mezari kisa bir süre önce Auriga'nin eline gecmis olsa da, dogal merakinin onu degerli bir kasif ve toplayici yaptigi yeralti holdinglerinin magaralarinda kendini evinde hissetti. Ekipler halinde ya da tek basina Mezari ulusunun haritalandirilmis alanini genisletmesi ve hala adapte olmaya calistiklari yeralti dünyasina dair anlayislarini büyük ölcüde gelistirmesiyle ünlüydü. Irjsko, tek basina ciktigi bir kesif gezisi sirasinda -sikilmamak icin düzenli olarak yaptigi türden bir seydi- Auriga'nin bilinmeyen ve ölümcül oldugu söylenen yüzeyine acilan yeni ve bakimli oldugu belli olan bir kapak kesfetti. Merakli ve süpheci bir sekilde bu kapiyi gözetledi ve kisa süre sonra korkunc bir sirri kesfetti: Öjenikciler adi verilen bir grup hain bilim insani ve ideolog, canli denekler üzerinde hayatta kalma teknolojisini test ediyordu. O kapidan gizlice laboratuvarlarinin ve yasam alanlarinin derinliklerine inen Irjsko, operasyonla ilgili her seyi detaylandirmak icin öfke dolu birkac gün gecirdi. Yüzey kesiflerinden biri sirasinda, demir gibi bir iradeye ve intikam arzusuna sahip bir denek olan Bayari Kulaa ile tanisti. O günler hicbir zaman resmi olarak kaydedilmemis olsa da ve Irjsko'nun operasyonla ilgili kayitlari, kesin olsa da, seyrek olsa da, Öjenikcilerden ve deneklerinden bahsettigi tutku, Kulaa ile olan iliskisinin silah arkadasligindan daha fazlasi oldugunu gösteriyor.
Kisa bir süre sonra Irjsko raporunu hazirlamak ve birliklerle geri dönmek üzere laboratuvar alanindan ayrildi. Ancak, gittigi süre icinde laboratuvar ve icindeki ya da yakinindaki herkes bir dizi ölümcül - ve dikkatle planlanmis - yanginin ardindan ortadan kayboldu. Irjsko, Kulaa ve arkadaslarinin pesini birakmayarak yüzeye pek cok ziyarette bulundu. Tutumu büyük ölcüde degisti ve bulduklari tüm kacaklara acimasizca davrandilar. Yine de Irjsko'nun kariyeri yükselmeye devam etti ve Mezari toplumunda bircok üst düzey görevde bulundu. Ancak Öjenikciler olayindan sonra asla eskisi gibi olmadi, her zaman daha soguk ve daha sert bir savasci oldu.
Samur Aldatici Bayari Kulaa
Samur Aldatici Bayari Kulaa II
Samur Aldatici Bayari Kulaa III
Samur Aldatici Bayari Kulaa

Bugün Unutulmuslarin Ilki olarak bilinen Kulaa, o zamanlar cilgin bir Mezari mutasyon programinin denekleri arasinda sadece en sert ve en direncli olaniydi. Bir yetim, hirsiz ve bas belasi olan Kulaa, Mezari icindeki gizli bir örgüt olan Öjenikciler tarafindan alinip hayatta kalma biyoteknolojisini test etmek icin kobay haline getirilen bircok toplumsal dislanmistan biriydi. Amaclari asil olabilirdi - Auriga'nin düsman yüzeyinde hayatta kalma yetenegi - ama yöntemleri tamamen igrencti. Kulaa'nin dogal dayanikliligi bu cileli yillar boyunca ona iyi hizmet etti ve her seye ragmen muhafizlarinin gözleri önünde Mezari laboratuvarlarindan yararli nesneler kacirmaya basladi. Düdük caldiginda geri dönmeyecegi o günü planlayarak yüzeye pek cok sorti yapti. Ancak Kulaa, tebaasina duydugu merhamet ve sadece kacmak degil, ayni zamanda intikam almak icin giderek artan derin arzusu nedeniyle o günü ertelemeye devam etti. Beklenmedik müttefiki, Öjenikcilerin faaliyetlerinden süphelenen ve onlari tünellerden ve magaralardan tesislerine kadar takip eden Mezari muhafiz yüzbasisi Irjsko Lasmak oldu. Iki kadin arasindaki iliski hakkinda, birinin kanit, digerinin ganimet topladigi uzun ve yogun günleri birlikte gecirdikleri gerceginden baska pek az sey bilinmektedir. Irjsko'nun gözyaslari ve kanla lekelenmis bir rapor sunmak üzere üstlerine döndügü gün, Kulaa'nin ve yüzlerce denegin görüldügü son gündü. Ayni zamanda magaralarin tüm bir bölümünün ve Öjenikcilerin tüm calismalarinin patlamalar ve yanginla yok oldugu gündü...
Kulaa kabilenin fiili lideri oldu ve Auriga'nin dönüstügü zehirli ve mutasyona ugramis dünyanin korkunc cilesinden büyük ölcüde onun sayesinde kurtuldular. Yüksek daglarda huzur bulan Unutulmuslar, onun dogum gününü ulusal kutlamalari haline getirdiler ve onu Samur Aldaticilarin ilki ve en büyügü olarak saygiyla aniyorlar.
Cehennem
Dönüstürücü Toz Tutulmasi fenomeni, yepyeni Volkanik arazi ve sadece Volkanik araziden yiyecek toplayabilen yildizlararasi ziyaretciler "Kapaku" ana grubu ekleniyor.

Auriga'da hayatta kalmak icin cabalayanlarin hepsi bu dünyadan gelmiyor. Tamirciler ve mucitler olan Kapaku'lar, gizemli makinelerin gelisi onlari yok olmanin esigine getirene kadar kendi kül ve ates dünyalarinda mutlu bir hayat yasadilar. Sonsuzlar tarafindan tahliye edilen Kapaku, Auriga'yi bazalt ve lavdan olusan baska bir cennete dönüstürmek icin makinelerle donatilmis olarak buraya gelir. Ancak yogun toz faaliyetlerinin yasandigi büyük mevsimlerle sarsilan bu dünyayi kesfeden Kapaku'nun hayallerini gerceklestirmek icin savasmasi gerekecektir.
Golem Kampini yerlestirmek icin karoyu secin.
Bu volkan bicimlendirici cevredeki araziyi dünyalastiriyor.
Bu volkanformatör bir ordu tarafindan sökülüyor.
Bu ordu bir volkanformeri parcaliyor.
Bu birim Ruh Yanmasi altindadir. Saldirisi \7772\ artmistir, ancak her savas turunun basinda hasar alir.
Ruh Yanigi
Bu Kahraman Ruh Yanmasi altinda. Saldirisi \7772\ artar, ancak her savas turunun basinda hasar alir.
Tas Nöbetci
Kapaku samanlarinin yarattiklari nöbetci golemler, Kapaku ordularinin güclü ama yavas ve savas alani rehberligi ile daha etkili olan saglam ön cepheleridir.
Geomancer
Uzun menzilli saldirilar yapabilen büyücüler olan geomancerlarin asil gücü, topragin gücünü kullanarak ön saflardaki golemleri desteklemelerinden gelir.
Golem Sürücüsü
Kapaku binicisi ve golem binegi kombinasyonu müthis bir kombinasyondur ve bu birimler herhangi bir savasin ilk asamalarinda cok önemli bir rol oynayabilir.
Kapaku

Kendi dünyalarinin yok edilmesinden kurtulan Kapaku'lar, yildizlarin ötesine gecerken yüzyillardir uyukluyorlardi. Auriga'nin dehset verici derecede canli ve yesil topraklarinda ortaya cikan Kapakularin tek bir amaci var: kül ve lavdan olusan eski dünyalarini yeniden yaratmak.

Volkan olusumu
Herhangi bir araziyi Volkanik bir araziye dönüstürecek makineler yaratmak icin Stratejik Kaynaklari kullanin.
Yildiz Gözlemcileri
Auriga'nin Toz Tutulmalari modeli, aylarin kaotik etkilesimine dayanan Beton Sonsuz tarafindan iyi anlasilmisti.
Sonsuz Hayranlik
Sonsuzlara ve onlarin büyülü teknolojilerine olan takinti, Auriga'nin harabelerindeki dogal meraki artiriyor.
Kapaku Görünümü
Özel fraksiyonunuz Kapaku'nun 2D ve 3D görsellerini gösterecektir.
Kapaku Ana Görevi

Ana gezegenlerinin makineler - Sanal Sonsuz'un yeryüzü sekillendirici robotlari - tarafindan yok edilmesinden sonra, Beton Sonsuz Kapaku'yu Auriga'ya getirerek onlara baska bir atesli Cennet'e dönüstürebilecekleri bir dünya vaat etti. Kapaku Auriga'nin kurtaricilarinin onlari inandirdigi gibi bos bir dünya olmadigini kesfettiginde, Bekci Aktyl bu yeni dünyanin ne gibi sirlar barindirdigini merak etmeye baslar...
Mistik Kelimeler
Toz Tutulmalarinin getirdigi genel kafa karisikligi ve gizemli mistisizm nöbetleriyle, sakin Drakken diplomatlari bu dönemde müzakereler sirasinda daha etkilidir.
Setseke Infüzyon
Klan kültürünün temelini olusturan dev bok böcekleri Setsekeler, Toz Tutulmalari sirasinda canlanarak güclerine daha da fazla saygi duyulmasina yol acar.
Volkanik Leke
Volkanik Arazide Yiyecek Yok
Tua'nin Cekici
Bekci Tua tarafindan kendi halkina karsi kullanilan güclü bir silah olan Tua'nin Cekici, Kapaku isciligini süphesiz Sonsuz, Gözetmen Elohys tarafindan saglanan karanlik sanatlarla birlestirir.
Külden Dogan
Kaya ve atesten olusan bir dünyadan gelen Kapaku'lar yalnizca kül ve digerlerinin yenilmez bulacagi minerallerle beslenir ve ordulari diger gruplari yipratacak volkanik bölgelerde gelisir.
Samanin Icgörüsü
Tozun canlandirici etkilerine dair jeomantik arastirmalar, Kapaku samanlarinin daha saglam Tas Nöbetciler yaratmasina izin verir.
Ic Huzur

Yeni bir aidiyet duygusuyla Kapuku Auriga'yi kendi miraslarinin bir parcasi olarak görmeye baslayabilir. Bir zamanlar davetsiz misafirken, simdi bu gezegenin karmasik tarihinden ilham alan Aurigalilar.
Ic Huzur
Koni Elit Biniciler Okulu

Adini kötü söhretli bir biniciden alan bu devasa kale, Kapaku'nun en gelecek vaat eden ajanlarini egiten seckin bir kuruma ev sahipligi yapmaktadir. Bu acimasiz deneme sahasinda egitilen askerler, görünüsteki acemi statülerinin ötesinde bir savas deneyimi kazanirlar.
Aurigan Arsivi
Artik yaklasan buzlar yüzünden kaybolmayacak olan Sonsuz'un Auriga'daki tüm girisimleri kataloglanacak ve sonsuza kadar saklanacak. Tarihciler ve bilim insanlari icin bir bilgi vahasi.
Golem Kampi
Yorulmak bilmeyen golem iscileri tarafindan doldurulan bu kamplar, sehirlerin ana metropollerinden tamamen ayri ilceler olusturmasini saglar.
Magma Hidrolik
Yüzeydeki lav akintilari tehlikeli olabilir, ancak farkli kosullar altinda magmanin anlasilmasi onlari bir nimete dönüstürebilir.
Jeotermal Eritme

Kapaku ana gezegenine döndügünde, makinelerin istilasinin boyutunu herkesten cok Makani anlamisti. Kesif icin dogal bir aclikla dogan Makani, yirmi bes yasindan önce bilinen dünyanin cogunu gezdi ve gercekten bilinmeyene dogru girisimde bulunmak icin siddetli bir arzuyla geri döndü. Bu amacla, benzersiz becerilere sahip bir tas samani oldu ve ates ve issizligin aksi takdirde misafirperver olmayan iklimlerine girmesine izin veren bir golem maiyeti olusturdu. Makani herkesten daha fazla makine faaliyetiyle karsilasti ve onlarin tehdidinin hafife alinmamasi gerektigi konusunda uyarida bulunan en yüksek seslerden biriydi. Ne yazik ki sözlerine kulak asilmadi. Auriga'da Makani'nin gezginlik tutkusu azalmadi ve simdi kesfedilmemis cöllerde dolasmak icin daha da fazla nedeni var.

Volkanik olarak aktif Waiyo Dagi'nin üst yamaclarindan gelen efsanevi Raui Klani'nin bir savascisi olan Ululani, Makine Savaslari sirasinda ilk elden savas deneyimi kazandi. En iyi ani, Raui kalesinin tahliyesi sirasinda, makinelerin ilerleyisini birkac gün boyunca durduran ve klanin cogunun kacmasina izin veren kahramanca bir durusa liderlik ettigi zaman geldi. Isik hizinda iletisim kurabilen hizli ve hareketli bir düsman tarafindan silahsiz birakilmasina ragmen Ululani, makineleri saskina ceviren bir dizi savas alani stratejisi uyguladi. En iyi aninda arizali bir makineyi ele gecirmeyi basardi ve bugün hala onu inceliyor.

Baslangicta Magma Konseyindeki On Iki kisiden biri olan Takari, Sonsuz kurtaricilarinin gerekcelerini alenen sorgulayinca Kapaku'nun en yüksek makamindan atildi. Beton Sonsuzlar'in Kapaku'yu bakir Auriga dünyasina tahliye etme planlarindan vazgececeklerinden korkan Konsey üyesi arkadaslarinin cogu onu ihanetle sucladi ve Darkshaft Madenlerinin derinliklerindeki kötü söhretli hapishaneye hapsettirdi. Bekci Aktyl'in eylemleri olmasaydi, Takari hic süphesiz o umutsuzluk cukurunda terk edilmis olarak kalacakti. Ancak Aktyl onun potansiyel degerini anladi ve onu Aurigan'a bagli bir yildiz gemisine kacirdi ve orada gizlilik icinde uyumasini sagladi. Artik Auriga'da özgür olan Takari bir kez daha zorlu bir lider, ancak Sonsuz hakkindaki cekincelerini kendine saklayan biri.

Büyük Rahip Akuma

Akuma beklenmedik bir Kapaku kahramanidir. Akamai Simyacilar Okulu'nun önde gelen samanlarindan birinin yedinci cocugu olan Akuma, cocuklugunu annesinin ve daha da önemlisi büyük kardesinin basarilarinin gölgesinde yasayarak gecirdi. Toz simyasi teorilerini pek kavrayamayan beceriksiz bir zanaatkâr olan Akuma'nin hayati, Sonsuz'un geldigi güne kadar sefil bir utanc icinde gecti. Makinelerin Kapaku'nun kül ve tas medeniyetine yönelik tehdidinin zaten farkinda olan Akuma, aile baglantilarini kullanarak Beton Sonsuzlari Kapaku'nun ilahi kurtaricilari olarak gösteren siyasi bir platform olusturdu ve inanci meyvelerini verdikce hizla popülist bir takipci kitlesi olusturdu. Kurtaricilarimizin Tapinagi'nin kurulmasinda büyük rol oynayan Bas Rahip Akuma, halki arasinda büyük bir güce sahip olan dogal bir hatiptir.

Sonsuz'un yildiz gemisiyle harap olmus ana gezegenlerinden kacanlar arasinda hicbir Kapaku mekanik icat sanatinda Pali'den daha büyük degildi. Navigasyon, zaman ölcümü, silah, hareket ve mimari alanlarindaki ilerlemelerden sorumlu olan Pali, ilham verici calismalariyla gelisen Geomancer Evi'ne büyük prestij kazandirdi. Makineler geldiginde, bunlarin karmasik makineler oldugunu ilk fark edenlerden biri oldu ve daha sonra bunlarin olasi kökenleri üzerine cok kafa yordu. Daha sonra, Beton Sonsuz Kapaku'yu makine tehdidinden kurtardiktan sonra, Auriga'yi terraform etmek icin gereken volkan sekillendirme cihazlarinin en iyi Pali ve jeomancer arkadaslarina emanet edilecegi acikti.

Bir cocugun dogal merakina sahip ince bir zekâya sahip olan Saman Rawiri, baslangicta Toz simyalarinin canlandirici gücü hakkindaki bilgisini genisletmek adina siyasi meselelerden uzak durmustu. Makinelerin gelisi yeni golem formlari yaratma deneylerini sekteye ugrattigi icin hayal kirikligina ugramis olsa da, Sonsuz kurtaricilar Auriga'dan ve onun harikulade Toz Tutulmalarindan bahsettiginde, Rawiri bu fenomeni bizzat deneyimlemek icin can atiyordu. Toz Tutulmasi'nin eylemlerinin Kapaku'nun bu zorlu yeni dünyadaki talihinde devrim yaratabilecegine inaniyor ve deneylere baslamak icin sabirsizlaniyor.
Haukea Wai
Haukea Wai

Makinelerle savas sirasinda Kapaku ana gezegeninde bir ergen olan Haukea Wai, gelecekteki hayati, arkadaslari ve ailesi savasta paramparca olurken aciz bir sokla izledi. Parlak ve yetenekli bir genc olan Haukea, yasanan olaylar karsisinda kendini kaybolmus hissetti ve Bekci Aktyl, Koni Elit Biniciler Okulu'nun kurulusunu ilan etmeden önce uzun bir süre saskin bir travma halinde yasadi. Sonunda yetenegini ve incinmisligini verimli bir yöne kanalize edebildi, ögrenme askini yeniden kesfetti ve yüksek bir golem binegine etkili bir sekilde binmenin hem felsefi hem de fiziksel yönlerinde mükemmellesti. Dahasi, bu calismalar sirasinda Haukea'nin icinde tüm enerjisini toplumunu korumak icin kullanma arzusu dogdu - bu gelisme daha sonra onu Auriga'daki kisisel elcisi olarak secen Bekci Aktyl'in gözünden kacmadi.
Bekci Tua
Bekci Tua

Magma Konseyi'nde Haku Klani'nin temsilcisi olan Bekci Tua, makinelerle savasin baslangicini belirleyen bir felakette klan üyelerinin cogunun yok olmasina ragmen Onikiler arasinda kalmaya devam ediyor. Yorulmak bilmeyen, tek fikirli bir lider olan Bekci Tua, felaketten önce Konsey'de makinelerin göz ardi edilmemesi gerektigi konusunda uyarida bulunan tek sesti. Ne yazik ki Tua görmezden gelindi ve makineler Haku'nun kalesini cevreleyen büyük lav kolunun tasarak yüzlerce kisinin ölümüne neden oldugunda Haku Klani büyük bir bedel ödedi. Simdilerde derin bir keder tasiyan Tua yine de Magma Konseyi'nde inatci, sarsilmaz bir varlik ve sesi daha kolay duyulan biri. Auriga'daki tüm Kapaku'lar arasinda Sonsuz'un temsilcisi Overseer Elohys ile en yakin baglara sahip olan da o gibi görünüyor.

Yildizlarin altindaki uzun yolculugumuz sona erdi. Ama Auriga, Sonsuz'un bize vaat ettigi bos dünya degil. Bazilari daha medeni, bazilari daha az medeni olan diger deriler bu topraklarda kol geziyor. Zayif olanlarla baslamaliyiz...

Kücük ama hayati adimlar atiyoruz. Cevre topraklardaki ilkel kabilelerle dostane iliskiler icindeyiz ve ufkumuzu genisletmeye baslayabiliriz. Yine de bir sey beni rahatsiz ediyor - kabilelerden biri tarafindan bize hediye edilen garip bir mekanizma. Eski ama karmasik, derin bir gecmisten bahsediyor.
Bu yeni topraklardaki konumumuzu güvence altina almamiz gerekiyor. Sirayi bitirirken herhangi bir Stratejik Kaynaktan 5 birim stokladiginizdan emin olun.
Stratejik Kaynaklar en iyi sekilde Harabeleri kesfederek veya Stratejik Cikaricilar kullanarak elde edilebilir.
En yakin komsularimizla iyi iliskiler kurmaliyiz. Baskentinizin bölgesindeki tüm köyleri sakinlestirin.
Köyler rüsvet, saldiri veya uzlasma yoluyla pasifize edilebilir.
2. Otherskins

Bekci Aktyl'in Günlügünden
Gece dehseti her aksam bana saldiriyor.
Yari gercek, yari fantezi, eski dünyamizdaki son günlere dair anilarimdan doguyorlar. Katil makineler dalga dalga son kalan yerlesim yerlerimize yaklasiyor, sayilari her gecen gün azalan Golem savunucularimiza carpiyor. Onlarin ötesinde güzel dünyamizin coktan yok oldugunu görüyorum - bir zamanlar lav düzlükleri olan yerleri kaplayan saglam otlar, uykuya dalan yanardaglar, igrenc derecede temiz hava. Ve sonra Sonsuz kurtaricilarimiz geliyor, makine tehdidini yok ediyor, ama Gözetmen Elohys bana ulastiginda bir el degil, bir yumruk uzatiyor.
Her zaman o anda uyaniyorum, tas gibi soguk.
Auriga inanmamiz icin yönlendirildigimiz bos dünya degil. Gözcülerimiz daha eski mekanizmalar ortaya cikardilar. Bunlarin coktan ölmüs irklarin ivir zivirlari, belki de caglar önce dünyaya düsen Otherskins'in kayip eserleri olabilecegini ummustuk, ancak bir Kapaku kesif gezisi yasayan, nefes alan Otherskins'lerle yüz yüze geldiginde bu rüya sona erdi. Magma Konseyi toplantisinda gercekler aciklanirken Bekci Tua'yi dikkatle izledim... Söylediginden daha fazlasini biliyor.
Gözetmen Elohys, Otherskins'in varligini kücümsüyor. "Evrim inatcidir" diyor. "Hayat bir yolunu bulur".
Sonsuz, Auriga'da yerlesim oldugunu bilmedigi ve bu gercegin hicbir seyi degistirmedigi konusunda israr ediyor. "Dünya hâlâ kendi suretinizde yaratabileceginiz bir yer. Bizim onayimizi aldiniz. Ve araclarimiza." (Kapaku'nun üzerine bir ciddiyet cöktü. Bir bölünmenin kipirtilari var. Bazilari daha fazla harekete gecmeden önce bu Ötekiler hakkinda daha fazla bilgi edinmemiz gerektigini fisildarken, digerleri volkan olusturma cabalarimizin bir an önce iki katina cikarilmasi gerektigini mirildaniyor.
Herkesin hemfikir oldugu tek bir sey var: Hazirlikli olmaliyiz. Simdi ideolojik tartismalarin zamani degil. Hayatta kalmamiz tehlikede.
Bu topraklarda Otherskins'in dolastigini ögreniyoruz. Önceligimiz savunma olmali.
Bu dünyadaki sahil noktamiz savunulmali. Imparatorlugunuzda 5 Tas Nöbetci bulundurun.
Tas Nöbetcilerin belirli bir orduda veya sehirde olmasi gerekmez.

Bekci Aktyl'in Günlügünden

Ancak her zaman uyum icinde degiller. Dün, onlari öfkeli bir tartisma icinde gördüm Sonsuz, bastirilmis bir öfkenin titreyen volkaniydi, Tua ise akkor halindeki atesi tükürüyordu. Her ay Otherskins'in hayatta kalma planlarinin fisiltilarini duyuyoruz - kacis, uyku, inis - ve onlarin fikirleri kendi geomancer'larimizin hayal güclerini besliyor. Bu yüzden umut ediyoruz ve atesleri tutusturmaya devam ediyoruz.
Ne olursa olsun, Auriga'nin gecmisinin kaybolmamasini saglayabiliriz. Tarihi asla yok etmeyecegiz - ya da yikmayacagiz. Ne kendi tarihimizi ne de baskalarininkini.
Sonsuz'un laboratuvarlarina kesif gezileri düzenleniyor ve orada kilitli olan korkunc gözlükler inceleniyor, yapisöküme ugratiliyor ve kayit altina aliniyor. Ne de olsa biz tamirciyiz. Bu bizim en büyük gücümüz. Auriga'nin hikayesinin caglar boyunca sürmesi icin büyük bir anit-arsiv insa edecegiz.
Ister buz ister ates tarafindan tüketilsin, Kapaku bu dünyada iz birakacak.
Sonsuzlarin Auriga'daki utanc verici gecmisi unutulmamali. Ancak öncelikle bu dünyada kendi kralligimizi kurmali ve kendimizi en uzun kisa hazirlamaliyiz.

Aurigan Arsivi insa edildi, bu dünyanin hikayesi güvence altina alindi. Bu, tarihi bir depo oldugu kadar Kapaku yaraticiliginin da bir kaniti ve bize büyük gurur veriyor. Önümüzdeki caglarda arsivimizi hangi varliklarin ziyaret edecegini kim bilebilir? Simdilik Auriga'nin Otherskins'ini davet ediyorum. Ne de olsa bircogu Sonsuz'un cocuklari. Gelecek henüz yazilmadi ama gecmis asla unutulmamali.
Bütün bir bölgeyi tamamen volkanik hale getirerek Auriga'daki Kapaku varligini pekistirin.
Bir bölgeyi dünyalastirmaya baslamaniza gerek yok, ancak bir tanesini bitirmeniz gerekiyor.
Endless'in antik laboratuvar alanlarini inceleyin ve kataloglayin. $Region1Name, $Region2Name, $Region3Name, $Region4Name, $Progression'daki 4 yerel kalintiyi arastirin.

Aurigan Arsivi'ni kurun ve Endless'in utanc verici tarihinin asla unutulmamasini saglayin.

8. Sonsuzluk Icin Bir Anit

Bekci Aktyl'in Günlügünden
Sonsuz'un aldatmacasinin anisi, kolektif ruhumuzda hala ham ve aci verici. Yaralarin iyilesmesi uzun zaman alacak. Sonsuzlara güvendik, onlari kurtaricimiz olarak gördük ama onlar bizi bir silme aracindan baska bir sey olarak görmediler.

Bazilari, Auriga'nin bir dehset dünyasi oldugu günlerde onu yönetenin Sonsuzlardan biri olabilecegini düsünüyor. Her bir harabenin tam konumu harita üzerinde bir Toz Isini ile gösterilmektedir
Tutulmalar sirasinda Geri Dönüstürülmüs Stoklar, Gida bonusuna ek olarak hedef sehirde bir Savas Dogumu da yaratir.
Ordularinizin herhangi bir arazi türündeki karolari volkanik araziye dönüstürmesini saglar.
Lav Bacalari

Volkanik arazinin nadir bir özelligi olan Lav Bacalari, Fumarole kuzenlerinin patlayici gücünden yoksundur, ancak büyük miktarlarda Toz icin jeolojik cekicilerdir ve bu da onlari aranan bir hazine haline getirir.
Lav Gayzeri

Bilimsel bir nimet olan volkanik arazinin bu özelligi, jeoloji ile ilgilenenlere yeralti dünyasinin gelgitlerine ve akislarina dair büyük bir kavrayis sunarken, patlayici olsa da ara sira ortaya cikan bir endüstriyel güc kaynagi da saglamaktadir.
Fumarole

Efsaneye göre Fumaroller eritme ve dövme tanrisi tarafindan yaratilmistir, volkanik arazinin bu özelliginin endüstriyel faydasi budur. Yakininda calisanlar icin tehlikeli olsa da hayranlik uyandiran bir manzara.
Caldera Gölü

Tozun parildamasina neden olacak kadar sicak, ancak haslanmayacak kadar serin olan Kaldera Gölleri, volkanik arazinin bir özelligidir ve önemli miktarda Tozun taranmasina izin verirken ayni zamanda kücük bir dogal isi kaynagi saglar.
Toz Firsatcilari
Sabit bir miktar ve sizilan imparatorlugun Tozunun kücük bir yüzdesini calar \7703\
Kücük bir sabit miktar ve sizilan imparatorlugun Tozunun bir yüzdesini calar \7703\
Cok kücük bir sabit miktarin yani sira sizilan imparatorlugun Tozunun büyük bir yüzdesini calar \7703\
Volkanformer
Concrete Endless tarafindan tasarlanan ve Aurigan zenginliklerinden güc alan Volcanoformer, herhangi bir vahsi dogayi lavlarla kapli bazalt ovalara dönüstürebilir.

Besleyici Conflux

Toz Tutulmalarinin sonuclarindan biri olan Toz ve mineral etkilesimlerinin neden oldugu bu garip fenomen, üzerinde dolasan sansli birimi Tutulma süresi boyunca yenileyici etkilerle kutsar. Konflüks etkileri ayni tür icinde birikmez.
Güclendirici Conflux

Toz Tutulmalarinin sonuclarindan biri olan Toz akilariyla iliskili bu garip fenomen, üzerinde dolasan sansli birimi Tutulma süresi boyunca güclendirici etkilerle kutsar. Konflüks etkileri ayni tür icinde birikmez.
Swift Conflux

Toz Tutulmalarinin sonuclarindan biri olan ve sicak toz bulutlariyla baglantili bu tuhaf fenomen, üzerinde dolasan sansli birimi Tutulma süresince yüksek hiz ve algiyla kutsar. Konflüks etkileri ayni tür icinde birikmez.
Kamp Cini
Tutulmus Tapinak
Tutulmanin gölgesi bu kadim tapinakta yeni olasiliklari ortaya cikariyor.
Dünyamiz kül ve atesten bir cennetti,
Ta ki tanrilar kiyametlerini üzerimize getirene kadar.
Golemlerimizle, yaraticiligimizla bile,
Onlarin gücüyle boy ölcüsemezdik.
Kirilmis ve dagilmis,
kurtaricilarimiz olmasaydi yok olurduk.
Bizi bu dünyaya onlar getirdi.
... bize yeni bir amac verdi
... ve bizim olmasi icin yeni gücler.
Ve onu bizim yapacagiz.
fedakarlik ne olursa olsun.
Symbiosis
Adds the great Urkan beasts, who surface from Auriga's depths, and the Mykara faction: A fungal collective whose subterranean mycelial networks allows them to easily strike out into virgin territory.

Denizens of Auriga's deepest, darkest caverns, the Mykara are an ancient species that has spread across the subterranean realm over the ages. Now with the great Urkan beasts stirring again, the Mykara has breached the crust once more, pitching itself into a land teeming with ambitious cultures and peoples. Who will it enmesh this time in its efforts to preserve the balance?
Ipotane
Highly mobile but relatively weak, Mykara ipotanes excel at harassing sorties intended to wear down the enemy from afar.
Gorgon
Hitting hard and fast, Mykara gorgons are nimble fighters who can quickly take the battle to enemy, but are best employed in shock attacks due to their relatively frail composition.
Shambler
Construed from the toughest, densest mycelial fibers, Mykara shamblers are slow and heavy, entangling and locking down enemies with their incredible defenses.
Kazar

The largest of the three great beasts, Kazar moves with an unhurried gait that belies its great strength and arrogance. Often crusted with precious ores when emerging from the depths, Kazar is sometimes the target of brave, or foolhardy, adventures who attempt to liberate the valuable stones.
Chaka

Legends have it that Chaka is the shyest of the Urkans, reputedly roaming Auriga's emptier regions, and enjoying solitude more than conflict. Equally, however, Chaka is said to be the most ferocious of the three beasts, and there are many tales of its rage and destruction.
Fakir

Of the three Urkans who are the eternal adversaries of the Mykara, Fakir is the one who strikes the greatest fear into the fungal collective. Blessed with a extremely keen olfactory senses, legend has it that Fakir can track subterranean rhizome paths for leagues upon leagues.
Kazar

The largest of the three great beasts, Kazar moves with an unhurried gait that belies its great strength and arrogance. Often crusted with precious ores when emerging from the depths, Kazar is sometimes the target of brave, or foolhardy, adventures who attempt to liberate the valuable stones.
Chaka

Legends have it that Chaka is the shyest of the Urkans, reputedly roaming Auriga's emptier regions, and enjoying solitude more than conflict. Equally, however, Chaka is said to be the most ferocious of the three beasts, and there are many tales of its rage and destruction.
Fakir

Of the three Urkans who are the eternal adversaries of the Mykara, Fakir is the one who strikes the greatest fear into the fungal collective. Blessed with a extremely keen olfactory senses, legend has it that Fakir can track subterranean rhizome paths for leagues upon leagues.
Urkan Lice

Lice-like organisms that make sanctuary under the Urkans' great exoskeletal plates, these creatures act like the fanatical guard of an inspirational monarch, fighting to protect their host with unflinching resolve and cold intelligence.
Urkan Lice

Lice-like organisms that make sanctuary under the Urkans' great exoskeletal plates, these creatures act like the fanatical guard of an inspirational monarch, fighting to protect their host with unflinching resolve and cold intelligence.

Urkan Lice
Mykara

Ancient dwellers of the subterranean realm with mycelial webs stretching throughout the crust, the Mykara are one of Auriga's oldest species. Legend has it they have broken onto the surface many times through the ages, in an eternal struggle with the great Urkan beasts.

Mykara Main Quest
A Vaulter leader, saved by the Mykara after the slaughter of her people, slowly comes to terms with her new existence--and the strange symbiosis between the Mykara and the Urkans.
Twilight Flourish
With Dust in the air during Aurigan Eclipses, it becomes possible to accelerate tendril growth, resulting in much faster deployment of mycelial outgrowths.
Creeping Presence
With mycelial webs spread throughout the underground, tendrils can easily exploit undefended sites across Auriga.

Single city No settler production
Can create Fungal Blooms on Points of Interest in owned and neutral regions, exploiting the tile while granting: - Extractors on resource Deposits - Watchtowers on Foundations - Assimilation access on pacified minor faction Villages out of territory - Tunnel entrances on Temple and Unspoiled Ruins, allowing fast travel between ruins
Fungal Bloom creation consumes Food from the Main City, for a few turns
Overgrown Cities

The Mykara seek new races in order to evolve through symbiosis, capturing cities in a unique manner. Enmeshed in a web of mycelial tendrils, cities' further development is arrested but limited resources are still channeled back to the nexus.

Captured cities become Overgrown, initiating a period of symbiosis Once completed, symbiosis grants a unique trait, different for each faction Overgrown cities only grant the output from tiles to the Main City, while any further development is impossible
Urkan Encampment

Featuring a natural symbiosis with the Urkans on account of their entwined evolution, the Mykara can find shelter and sustenance on the great beasts' carapaces, allowing them to station armies inside.
Allows you to garrison Units in tamed Urkans you control
Urkan Politics
Taming one of the great Urkans isn't easy--and by no means leads to a 100% dependable servant--but having one of the beasts on your side does strike the fear of the gods into rivals.
-30% Influence cost #8A7DFF#\7704\#REVERT# on diplomatic interactions, for each controlled Urkan
Organic Industry
With Mykaran foodstuff a living, symbiotically-entwined part of the fabric of the nexus, the fungal species can leverage the fruits of these gardens into industrial production.
Gives a bonus of Industry production \7701\ equal to 10% of the Food production \7700\ on the main city
Organic Defense
With the very fabric of the city made from mycelial webs, defenses are stronger than the brittle nature of rock and clay, and additionally enjoy the ability to self-repair after damage.
Inefficient Extraction
Although able to extract resources from the earth, production is halved compared to usual extractors.
Urkan Encampment
A union of sturdy engineering and pheromone manipulation, this knowledge allows the carapace of the great beasts to be used as a garrison for soldiers.
Urkan Politics
Understanding how an Urkan might be influenced gives a great advantage in diplomatic negotiations, and especially leads to many friendly overtures from rivals.
Iron Veins
Across the mycelial lands, a strengthening of the subterranean tendrils and rhizomes means greater quantities of precious resources can be carried back to the heart of the Mykaran collective.
Urkan Agriculture
With mycelial networks riddling the land, when a great beast is rooted to a region it can help to process tough nutrients, channeling sustenance from rivals to allies.
While Urkan is rooted to a region Own and Allied Cities in neighboring regions produce +30% Food #CFE14F#\7700\#REVERT# Enemy Cities in neighboring regions produce -15% Food #CFE14F#\7700\#REVERT#
+30% FOOD #CFE14F#\7700\#REVERT#
-15% FOOD #CFE14F#\7700\#REVERT#

Healing Secretion

Urkans secrete a complex pheromone, which when correctly treated can aide nearby armies defenses and regeneration. The effect is thought to be connected to symbiotic relationships between normally-warring bacterias.
While Urkan is in army form Allied units in the same region have +20% Defense \7773\ Allied units in the same region have +20% Life Regen \7770\
Requires Kazar
Reinforced Carapace
Applying a salve concocted from a rare mushroom onto the Urkan carapace gives the great beast and their minions a harder shell and better constitution.
Reinforced Carapace effects
Requires Kazar
Fecund Brood
Via a careful chymical procedure, Urkans can be seeded with exotic concoctions that accelerate lice production under the exoskeletal plates.
Urkans under your control spawn Lice 50% faster
Requires Kazar and Chaka
Endurance Training
Experiments on the lice strains living on Kazar and Fakir have led to a stunning discovery: Their mutual interaction produces natural defenses making Urkans resilient to winter's effects.
Removes penalties on Urkan due to Winter
Requires Kazar and Fakir
Coordinated Tremors
Careful training by skilled beast-masters allows the Urkans to coordinate earth-shattering 'blows' that superpose over each other, producing long-distance attacks on fortifications.
Urkans gain the "Tremors" army action, producing long distance siege damage
Requires Kazar, Chaka, and Fakir
Chymical Warfare
Possessed with the unique ability to 'read' and transform chymical markers, while rooted Chaka can disrupt nearby enemies' scientific investigations and pass on genuine research to allies.

Twitch Aura

Monstrous Watchtower

With their towering height, Urkans naturally enjoy a peerless view of the surrounding terrain, but conveying what they see into useful intel can be difficult. Through beast-master training of Chaka, however, such information can be gleaned from all Urkans.
Urkans under your control have +5 Vision Range

Urkan Power

Together, Chaka and Fakir can be instructed to perform a display of such intimidating power that nearby friendly populations feel a deep sense of relief, while nearby enemy populations tremble in fear--and lose confidence in their leaders.

Berserker Blood

Urkan blood--or the equivalent--is potent stuff, and Fakir's ichor is no exception. When mixed with a rare mineral it becomes a fabulous draft of war, turning armies into beasts upon consumption. As it breaks down swiftly, it doesn't travel far.

Urkan Conditioning
With Fakir under control, beast-masters are able to teach the entire Urkan entourage they command to act more independently, raising their dynamism.

Urkan Lice
This little monster likes to live and feed off the Urkans, protecting them from outside threats.
Helm of the Urkans
Inspired by Urkan carapaces by an unknown blacksmith, this helm offers superb protection.
Wainwright's Cuirass
Fabled to be forged by the long-dead Broken Lord Baron Wainswright from a piece of Fakir's carapace, this cuirass can deflect otherwise mortal blows.
Greaves of Fury
Rumored to have worn by Saoshyant Tahas when he kicked to death seven court servants, this pair of greaves carry an air of doom, but give excellent defense.
Kernel of Plenitude
An artifact of unknown providence, only the awesome power contained within this seed is certain. Once planted it will swiftly grow into a fungal tree of wonder, sustenance, and Dust.
Fungal Exfoliator
A mobile operation, a tour of any region by the Fungal Exfoliator crew will see all pesky mycelial outgrowths razed and burnt.
Removes all Fungal Blooms from the region
Symbioze Metropolis
Every species' great habitat is different, but for the Mykara that makes no difference. Masters of symbiosis, the Mykara can swiftly enmesh any city, and discover its useful secrets.

Specialized Polyp 9S

Budded from a hardy fungal bloom located on the lower slopes of the Targadian Mountains, 9S owes its existence to the presence of an aggressive pack of Jotus wolves deemed a threat to Mykaran explorations in the region. Grown with the ancient memories and instincts of a long-dead Forgotten tracker, 9S was able to trail the Jotus back to their den, whereupon it killed the pack without remorse. Now left pondering its philosophical and solitary inclinations, 9S prefers roaming the barren wilds to life around the blooms, but still makes a near-peerless fighter.

Specialized Polyp 2D

When the Mykara came across an injured Drakken fledgling on the shores of a great ocean, 2D was swiftly budded in response. Infused with the knowledge of a decorated Drakken warrior, 2D was tasked with locating the fledging's eyrie, suspected to be found on isolated craggy islands somewhere out in the wild seas. Nursing the fledgling back to from the brink of death, 2D forged a strong bond with the young Drakken, and subsequently carried the young one back to its home island.

Specialized Polyp A7

Budded from a rhizome that emerged at the site of an Endless temple, from its first moments of awareness A7 was imbued with Dust. Its physical and mental capabilities developed with unusual rapidity, and was fully prepared to separate from the physical link with the Mykara far earlier than its peers and siblings. An interesting fact, however, is that the more A7 traveled and discovered, the more it missed the ignorance and simplicity of being one bud in a thriving colony of conjoined children. In spite of its deeds and fame, it looks forward, some day, to being reabsorbed into a simpler, quieter existence.

Budded from a rhizome that emerged at the site of an Endless temple, from its first moments of awareness A7 was imbued with Dust. Its physical and mental capabilities developed with unusual rapidity, and was fully prepared to separate from the physical link with the Mykara far earlier than its peers and siblings. An interesting fact, however, is that the more A7 traveled and discovered, the more it missed the ignorance and simplicity of being one bud in a thriving colony of conjoined children. In spite of its deeds and fame, it looks forward, some day, to being reabsorbed into a simpler, quieter existence.
Specialized Polyp 5X
Specialized Polyp 5X II
Specialized Polyp 5X III
Specialized Polyp 5X IV
Specialized Polyp 5X V
Specialized Polyp 5X VI
Specialized Polyp 5X

Apparently normal in every respect, 5X was in fact a mild mutation of the Mykara that was highly toxic to other forms of Aurigan life. It could not touch a flower without killing it, and streams took days to recover their natural ecosystem if 5X waded through. To its horror, there were even some strains of its own people to whom it was mildly poisonous, and it was due to this that 5X finally left, seeking answers and cures across Auriga. From the aromatic herbs, exotic barks, and medicinal shrubs of the mountains and deserts of Auriga it finally discovered a concoction that, once absorbed and integrated into its body, rendered it harmless. However, the vast knowledge it gained and the adventures it had lived meant that when 5X finally returned it was not merely welcomed, but acknowledged as a respected leader.

Specialized Polyp Q9
Specialized Polyp Q9

Growing up deep beneath Auriga, Q9 never imagined a life on the surface or to function independently of the mass of Mykara. However, as a normal part of fungal life its bloom was evolving slowly across crevices in the caverns when it happened upon an ancient Endless laboratory. While the technology was of little interest at the time, the concentration of Dust was enough to trigger a powerful response within the bloom. It quickly died off except for Q9, who evolved over weeks while slowly ingesting the biomass-and some of the knowledge-remaining within the facility. When it finally left it decided that the mysteries of subterranean spaces were no longer enough, and it set out to discover sunlight and pursue a life of exploration on the surface.

Specialized Polyp 3G

3G was an entirely normal, everyday Mykara until it discovered cheese. Marveling at the ways that fungi and its variants could alter and improve the flavors, 3G began to travel across Auriga to discover what others made and how they made it. Whether from the milk of sheep, cows, or goats, fresh or aged, salted or spiced, 3G began to study them all: the hard, crumbly "panra" of the Roving Clans; the agonizingly sharp "chabban" of the Ardent Mages; the hard rinds that the Forgotten boiled to add flavor to soups. Traveling and testing even on itself, this odd pastime paved the way for 3G to evolve into one of the most widely experienced, if odorous, Mykara leaders.

Specialized Polyp Z4

Formed from a bloom surrounded by Necrophage territories, by the time Z4 was independent its continued contact with the Necrophages turned it into something a bit different. From developing fungal strains that only attacked the Necrophages to adapting the weapons of other cultures to the odd morphology of the Mykara, it excelled in giving its bloom an upper hand in the skirmishes with its hungry neighbors. When the Necrophages finally overran the outpost, Z4 left to spread its theories and ideas to other Mykara sites so they could avoid that fate. Now respected as a fearsome warrior, Z4 is generally seen at the head of troop masses, a strange new weapon in hand, laying waste to its enemies.

Faresh Zima
Faresh Zima II
Faresh Zima III
Faresh Zima IV
Faresh Zima V
Faresh Zima VI
Faresh Zima

A distant descendant of Faresh Abiz, the legendary Ardent Mage who tamed one of the great Urkan beasts and led a famous victory over a splinter Vaulter clan, Faresh agitates to bring honor back to the family name after a long period of stagnation. Born into the privileged world of the upper echelons of Mage society, Zima's earliest memories were of decadent parties, empty spectacles of magic, and clandestine conversations at the home estate. Quickly, she came to despise that world, and vowed to not follow in her family's footsteps. Instead, Zima turned to the darkest pain rituals, inflicting great suffering on her physical person so that she might gain the greatest powers. Today, she seeks the fruits of those labors, wherever it may take her.
1. Dreams of a Massacre

The ozonic stench of the Mages' lightning attacks fills my nostrils, mingles with the smell of burning flesh. I stumble down a narrow passage, the dim phosphorescent light from the mycelial veins causing my shadow to flicker across the craggy stone. The rock shakes. I hear the deep-throated roar of the Urkan, and my skin crawls with terror. I'm gripping a weapon, a mighty axe, but it feels like deadweight in my hands. Am I rallying my men or running from the enemy? The passage opens into another tableau of slaughter, my kinsmen dying or dead on the cold stone, their blood sprayed in crimson arcs or pooled in dark puddles. I stop dead.
You cannot linger. You are Toth Ágnes. You are the First of the Bloodline. Others need you. Empty words. This is a slaughter. I know there are no others. I've brought death upon these people who followed me away from the homevaults.
----------
Memory and reality are hard to distinguish. I slumber, drifting between the past and present. The battle is over, of that I'm certain. I survived, somehow. In the here and now I feel renewal, regrowth, and a desire to reach into new places. I am confused. I slip back into my recollections, the familiarity outweighting the distress...
----------
Something grips my ankle, and my body tenses, fingers gripping the shaft of the axe. It's only a dying kinsman though. To my shame, I don't know his name. A handful of words spill from his lips, whispered and ragged.
"Avenge us."
Tears come to my eyes, but my sadness swiftly turns to fury. "I will," I reply, clutching his forearm. "I promise."
Everything is hazy in the aftermath of the Mages' massacre, but I survived. Now I must recover my strength. Now I must prepare for vengeance.
Research the Alchemist's Furnace tech, to enable the construction of Mykaran Extractors.
The technology to research is in Era I.
Deploy and fully grow $Target Mykaran Extractors. $Progression

The Extractors can be either Strategic or Luxury and can be placed on any region that is either under your control or neutral. Mykaran Extractors take several turns to grow and require Food during construction.

Even though I slumber, every day I feel myself grow stronger, more capable. Somehow I feel faraway places healing me and giving me sustenance. Soon I will come to full wakefulness, and understand, I'm sure. In the meantime, the memories of my people's slaughter at the hands of the Mages only sharpens my enmity.
2. The Apotheosis of Toth

Today I awoke and discovered the horrifying truth. I am Mykara, and the Mykara is me. We are one, a symbiosis of flesh and filaments, memories and myths. In the cold light of day, I can now clearly remember how I survived.
The Mykara had fascinated me for a long time, when I led those who would join me away from the homevaults. It was an anicent fungal species, mycelial tendrils and mushroom fruit, no sign of what it would one day become. Growing largely in the suberranean realm, it was unseen by most, and overlooked by the rest. But I saw its potential. Sinewy, resilient, vigorous, I knew it could transform a Vaulter settlement. And it did. Crops, waste, defense. It was a wonder material. It even began to shed light on the legendary Urkan beasts, who reputedly emerged from the Aurigan crust every few centuries, before slipping back into folkloric tales...sadly one of those same beasts came under the spell of our anicent enemy, the Mages, who used it to find and then destroy us...
As my kinsman died in my arms, as I basked in my feelings of vengeance, a desperate idea came to me. The Mykara had brought me to this juncture, and the Mykara would grant me my revenge. After all, in my heart, I'd always been convinced it was much more than a mere, mindless organism. I scrambled deeper and deeper into the earth, far into the inky darkness of the thickest mycelial forest, where thick tendrils vied with web-like skeins. Unable to move any further, I lay on a bed of filaments, and curled myself into a ball. It swiftly ensnared me, a cocoon of protection wrapped around a heart of malice...
Now we are one. It acts, I act, we act. Sometimes it almost feels like I'm doing things against my will. It is terrifying, but I will grow used to it, even perhaps enjoy it.
Besides, I have real power now. And the first task is to learn if I wasn't the only survivor.

My new existence--a union of Mykara and Vaulter--is an unsettling one, but one that gives me power. Before I begin my quest for vengeance, I must interrogate those nearby to learn if others of my vault survived.
Assimilate a Minor Faction.
Assimilation requires Influence; pacification can be done by conquest, bribery, or via a quest. The objective will be completed only at End Turn validation.
Control 5 Overgrown villages of any number of Minor Factions. $Progression
To "Overgrow" a village you must first pacify it by conquest, bribery, or via a quest.

Neither the local population nor their artifacts give any clue as to whether any other of my kinsmen survived the Mages' assault. Perhaps they are afraid and are good liars, but any inquiry regarding the Urkan-led massacre is met with vacant eyes and curt shakes of the head. It is strange...
3. The Place Where They Fell

I feel myself, my identity, slipping deeper into the Mykara's collective consciousness. It is a soothing, liberating, mind-expanding feeling, as my attention expands across the world and deeper into the past. But it is also a betrayal. I swore I would have vengeance, and I will not break that promise. I must not forget.
As the Mykara has changed me, so I have changed the Mykara. Out of my form, perhaps out of my very cells, it grows workers, builders, soldiers.
Some will be my instruments for my purposes. I will send an army back to our devastated home, and find the Mages' trail.
The site of our old vault--and the massacre--is hazy to me, but I must find it. During my slumber the Mykara moved me, and the geography of the world feels unfamiliar. It is hardly surprising that a Vaulter struggles to recognise the landscape; we've always been happier in the subterranean realm, more attuned to the vagaries of stone, the smell of the depths, and the shades of darkness that you learn from living underground.
Still, I have some ideas, and we will find the place. And if we are lucky, maybe we might even suprise a few Ardent Mages who've lingered too long...
The only way to pick up the trail of the Mages is to revisit the site of the massacre, the place I once named home. My armies will need to search among a few candidate sites.

Devastation upon devastation! I am ruined anew. I hang here in my cradle of tendrils, crushed under a new weight of knowledge. Centuries have passed! Centuries. I am old beyond mortal comprehension. I am cast adrift from every soul I ever knew. The only sliver of solace is the ancient Vaulter sword found in the ruins. What is my purpose now?
Search the 3 Ruins located in $RegionName1, $RegionName2 and $RegionName3 to pick up the Mages' trail.
Some of the locations may not be empty, so come ready to fight!
4. A Vengenace, Renewed

Calm, the Mykara whispers, but I am anything but calm. The growing symbiosis, the melding of my self into the Mykara collective, has been arrested as I find myself shaken to the very core. Did the Mykara save me or imprison me?
As my soldiers explored the ancient scene of the massacre, relaying their impressions through the mycelial web that stretches across Auriga, it was the small details that first alerted me to something being amiss. Flooded corridors and stagnant pools of water, lichen overgrowths and collapsed caverns, rusted machinery and scattered bones. Ironically, it wasn't until they came to the chamber of the great orrery, that the truth became impossible to deny. Despite the decay all around, the celestial mechanism had carried on working flawlessly, a testament to Vaulter engineering.
Auriga had circled its sun 284 times since the Mages' attack.
The Urkan beast commanded by the Mages would've returned to the depths. The Mage who was the architect of the slaughter would've died long ago. The same for their offspring. And their offspring's offspring, and onwards for who knows how many generations...
In that thought though, I found a tiny, devious, shard of hope. The Mages were a proud people, enraptured by their heritage, traditions--and history. A clan who committed such a famous victory--with an Urkan, no less!--would likely survive, even prosper, through the ages. The clan would be celebrated. Songs would be sung in their honor.
They wouldn't be hard to find. And so it was.
We will not have our revenge on those who committed the massacre. We will have our revenge on their descendants. They will pay for the sins of the ancestors, and they will have a new song to sing. Is there anything sweeter?
I war with the Mykara, but I still must avenge the Vaulter dead.
I am First of the Bloodline.
We cannot hurt those who committed the genocide, lost as they are to the river of time, but we can hurt their descendants.

The Vaulter fallen have been avenged--in part. Faresh Zima, a woman from the lineage of the butcher, is dead. I can feel the collective's condemnation, but the Mykara don't understand this is justice. An unexpected boon--Zima carried an ancient tome on the Urkans. Wouldn't it be even sweeter to complete our vengeance with their instrument of our slaughter?
Defeat the two armies roaming around $Region1 and $Region2. $Progression
The roaming armies may leave their initial regions, so you might need to search for them!
Defeat the Ardent Mage army hidden within the $QuestPOI in $Region3. Your army must be led by a Mykaran Hero equipped with Zolya's Blade.
This final army is led by a fearsome Ardent Mage, Faresh Zima, so be ready for a tough fight!
5. A Greater Purpose

I still feel the Mykara's disapproval, but I also feel their acceptance. Every day our union grows stronger. My thoughts entangle with the collective's, such that I'm sometimes unsure where my mind ends and the Mykara's begins. Calmed, I follow threads of meditations deeper and deeper into the distant past. I witness that the Mykara and the Urkans have clashed many times over the ages. The cycle is always the same. The Urkans emerge from the heart of Auriga and wander the land, wrecking havoc on the fledgling cultures they encounter. Before they can strike a terminal blow though, the Mykara rise up from the depths and pacify the beasts.
For time immemorial, the Mykara have been the Urkans' keepers. And now the Urkans rise again, the Mykara rise likewise.
I wonder how many souls like myself have been merged into the collective over the millenia? Within the collective's memories I find no impression of such spirits--either I haven't reached deep enough into the Mykara's recollections, or the psyches of these individuals has blended so intimately that they've become untraceable. Will this be my fate too?
From that well, another thought springs. Observing from a vantage point that spans the ages, my own vendetta against the Mages feels...petty...inconsequential. With the Urkans breaking the crust and roaming the lands once again, I must focus my will on a greater matter than revenge. I will prepare a Mykara hero...
With the Urkans returned, it is time to work in harmony with the Mykara. Even if it weakens us, we must study the ancient tome and gain dominance over the great beasts.

Our time spent studying the ways of the Urkans was not wasted. We have tamed the great beasts, and learned some of their weaknesses. Now I must better understand the balance that we seek, and be ready for the endless winter.
Equip a Hero with the "Testament of the Urkans" tome and have them govern your main city for $TurnDuration turns. $Progression
The book will affect your city negatively, plan accordingly!
With a greater understanding of the great beasts, it is time to tame another Urkan--or retain all three if already tamed.
Urkans can be tamed by conquest or bribery.
5. A Greater Purpose

I still feel the Mykara's disapproval, but I also feel their acceptance. Every day our union grows stronger. My thoughts entangle with the collective's, such that I'm sometimes unsure where my mind ends and the Mykara's begins. Calmed, I follow threads of meditations deeper and deeper into the distant past. Will this be my fate too?
From that well, another thought springs. Observing from a vantage point that spans the ages, my own vendetta against the Mages feels...petty...inconsequential. With the Urkans likely to roam the lands once again, I must focus my will on a greater matter than revenge. I will prepare a Mykara hero...
With the Urkans return imminent, it is time to work in harmony with the Mykara. Even if it weakens us, we must study the ancient tome and be ready for the great beasts.

I hope our time spent studying the ways of the Urkans was not wasted. We have learned some of their weaknesses I just hope we can use that knowledge. Now I must better understand the balance that we seek, and be ready for the endless winter.
Equip a Hero with the "Testament of the Urkans" tome and have them govern your main city for $TurnDuration turns. $Progression
The book will affect your city negatively, plan accordingly!
We learn that the Urkans are attracted to Luxuries. Gather $LuxuryAmount $LuxuryName to try to lure them out.
You can gather Luxuries through exploitation or by using the Marketplace.
6. Voices of the Past

Deep in my slumber, away from my corporeal perceptions, I hear them. A faint babble, not unlike the gentle susurration of waves on the shore. Listen more carefully though, and the murmur becomes more like a chorus of lullabies. They are the voices of children of Auriga, long assimilated into the Mykaran collective, and I am simply the most recent of their number. The youngest sibling.
I know not their names, and even though their bodily forms have no doubt enmeshed into the mycelial fabric to such a degree that identification would be impossible without instruments of science, I can feel their heritage. Among the refrain I detect a Drakken, Wild Walker, Sister of Mercy, Necrophage, even a Morgawr. No doubt there are others I cannot yet discern. I imagine they are in communion--conversing, pleading, persuading--a combined influence on the intentions of the Mykara who harbors them all.
They carry the history of their people, the history of Auriga.
The winter grows harsher every cycle. We must sharpen our weapons and weaken our enemies, so the Mykara--and all its voices--survive...
We must strengthen the Urkans we control and defeat the armies of lice that threaten the Mykara's survival. Only this way will the past be preserved.
The Urkans we've tamed are strong, and the dangerous lice armies vanquished. Now we are ready to begin protecting more of Auriga's heritage before the snows turn the surface into an icy tomb.
We must evolve the Urkans, make them stronger. Ensure there are at least 6 Urkan Upgrades unlocked.
Unlocks researched by other Empires also help you achieve this goal.
Defeat the roaming lice armies in $Region1Name and $Region2Name. $Progression
The roaming armies may leave their initial regions, so you might need to search for them!
6. Voices of the Past

Deep in my slumber, away from my corporeal perceptions, I hear them. A faint babble, not unlike the gentle susurration of waves on the shore. Listen more carefully though, and the murmur becomes more like a chorus of lullabies. They are the voices of children of Auriga, long assimilated into the Mykaran collective, and I am simply the most recent of their number. The youngest sibling.
I know not their names, and even though their bodily forms have no doubt enmeshed into the mycelial fabric to such a degree that identification would be impossible without instruments of science, I can feel their heritage. Among the refrain I detect a Drakken, Wild Walker, Sister of Mercy, Necrophage, even a Morgawr. No doubt there are others I cannot yet discern. I imagine they are in communion--conversing, pleading, persuading--a combined influence on the intentions of the Mykara who harbors them all.
They carry the history of their people, the history of Auriga.
The winter grows harsher every cycle. We must sharpen our weapons and weaken our enemies, so the Mykara--and all its voices--survive...
The Urkans are not abroad yet, even though their lice roam. We must bait them to the surface, and ensure they become ours. Only this way will the past be preserved.

The Urkans will come soon, the Mykara promise. Their dangerous lice armies are vanquished. Soon we will be ready to begin protecting more of Auriga's heritage before the snows turn the surface into an icy tomb.
Bait the Urkans by placing $LuxuryAmount $LuxuryName in the $QuestPOIName indicated by a ray of light.
You can gather Luxuries through exploitation or by using the Marketplace.
Defeat the roaming lice armies in $Region1Name and $Region2Name. $Progression
The roaming armies may leave their initial regions, so you might need to search for them!
7. A City In Amber

In the long silences I begin to discern the voices of the others more clearly. They are singing, a rich tapestry of music composed of many threads, each telling a piece of Auriga's history. In my mind's eye I see glittering cities of chrome and glass lancing up to the heavens, citadel-like eyries on snowy peaks, a band of hunched survivors trekking a devastated wasteland, each a remembrance from the Mykaran collective. I feel the stream of visions is a conversation, but I still lack the insight to follow the nuances, and the images come to me unexpectedly, jumping between long-separated eras like the attentions of a capricious god.
I don't think those that were once Wild Walker or Morgawr or Endless or whoever retain much sense of their own identity, and I feel the same thing happening to myself. The deeper I dive into the Mykaran collective--the more closely I can follow the symphony--the further I feel from my old self. I was a...Vaulter. Yes, a Vaulter leader. Something terrible happened to my people, but I forget the reasons, and only remember the fear and terror. It doesn't matter. It's over now. I'm sure the collective remembers, anyway.
Now my purpose is to spread the Mykara far and wide. Dispersal makes us safer, protects us from the whims of disaster. Most of all, as the unending winter threatens the world, it helps us preserve Auriga's past.
I am Mykara. Mykara is me. Like the others who've come before, I must help preserve the story of Auriga. We must ingest a city.

We have the city. I feel our tendrils reaching through its foundations, snaking its halls, and climbing its highest towers. Under the mycelial skin that swathes everything, time and entropy are much weakened foes. We preserve. Already we have found a most valuable artifact. And perhaps if we are lucky, within the ensnared city we will find another voice...
Overgrow a City and integrate the conquered's Faction Trait.
Integration will begin automatically when you take control of an enemy City.
7. A City In Amber

I am Mykara. Mykara is me. Like the others who've come before, I must help preserve the story of Auriga. We must reach out further.

We have the region. I feel our tendrils crossing its fields, climbing its hills, and delving its depths. Under the mycelial skin that swathes everything, time and entropy are much weakened foes. We preserve. Already we have found a most valuable artifact. And perhaps if we are lucky, within the webs we will find another voice...
Take control of $RegionName.
To attack another Empire's City you will need to declare War.
8. History's End

The endless winter comes, creating an icy tomb out of an entire world. Snows will lie a hundred hands deep. Oceans will freeze. Life will cease.
Well, if we are fortunate, not all life.
Some species seek refuges from time. Others grasp for the cold reaches of space. For ourselves, the Mykara, we will withdraw into the heart of the planet where molten fires battle against the encroaching ice.
We sing rich remembrances: vivid memories of biological horrors in Endless laboratories; their descendants eking out a life in irradiated wastelands; later, a slaughter of one Aurigan tribe by another in a subterranean citadel. Our melodic discourse speculates on science and philosophy, truth and justice, crime and punishment, but our first instinct is always to preserve. Whatever comes of Auriga, we will abide, ready to share its story.
Of the Urkans, we know not how they will survive the winter. Likely they will return to the depths as they have always done. Maybe the heat of the core will be enough to keep them alive. And if, in one distant day--decades, or centuries, or millenia hence, it doesn't matter--they emerge into an Aurigan spring, the Mykara will be ready.
Soon, the winter will be unending. We must make our first city an engine of our survival, as we prepare to retreat deep into the sanctuary--and warmth--of the mantle.

Our preparations for the endless winter are almost complete. The heart of our empire has never been stronger, our thirsting tendrils never more proficient, and our voices never louder. One day we will emerge from this icy crypt and tell the stories of Mykara and Urkan--and all of Auriga's other races.
Plant the Kernel of Plenitude in your Main City.
The artifact can be found in your city's "Available Constructions" list.
Produce 100 Food, Industry, Dust and Science in your Main City.
Use Fungal Blooms and build City Improvements to help reach the goal.
A World of Monsters

Urkans--the great, ancient beasts of legend--have broken through Auriga's crusts and are beholden to none. Towering over the land and riddled with aggressive lice, they are a dangerous foe perhaps best avoided, but they also offer the possibility of great power. Truly, the empire who can control and advance Kazar, Chaka, and Fakir to their full potential will be mighty indeed.
The legendary Urkans have returned to the surface--they must be tamed!
You did it! Kazar, Chaka, and Fakir are yours! They might not be fully housetrained yet, but other empires still quake in fear knowing you possess all three Urkans in prime shape.
Be the first Empire to tame all 3 Urkans and unlock all 13 of their special Abilities.
You will require a lot of Luxuries to accomplish your goal; they can be found in Deposits or bought on the Marketplace.
5. Departure

We Mykara have lived beneath the crust of this planet for so long, that now, finally on the verge of departure, we feel a great sadness. Our tales echo back through the ages, before the winters, before the blossoming of new races, before even the scarred and irradiated lands that the Endless wrought. Long, long ago, only the Urkans shared Auriga with us. We wonder what will become of the great beasts...
But we must not dwell on the past. We must look to the future--to the stars. We wonder what society we will forge, away from the loamy earth that has kept us safe all these millenia.
First though, we must secure the vessel...
It is time for the Mykara to secure the vessel that will take us to the stars. A simple task, no?

Finally, after so long entwined with the Aurigan loam, we leave this world. We may be Mykara, but within our fabric we carry the story of all the planet's races. May that wisdom guide us among the stars.
Search the initial Ruins in $RegionName with an army of at least 6 Gorgons of Lv.5. The Preacher army must be led by a Hero equipped with the Generator Crystal.
Certain special properties of the Crystal may help you to survive during your trip. Keep it safe.
The Crystal powers the engines; wait for $Timer turns until the engines are ready for takeoff.
Other empires, envious of your success, may decide to intervene.
Fungal Bloom Information
All Resources generated by this Fungal Bloom will be channeled to the Main City.
Mykaran Erycis Village
Nothing moves in the dark crevices and overhangs of the hydras' overgrown settlement.
Mykaran Bos Village
The Bos settlement is still and silent, mycelial webs covering all.
Mykaran Nidya Village
A great feeling of peace has settled on the overgrown Nidya settlement.
Mykaran Ceratan Village
The original webs of the Ceretan are hard to distinguish from the captor's mycelial filaments.
Mykaran Delvers Village
The thick stone walls of the Delvers' village is overgrown with mycelial webs.
Mykaran Dorgeshi Village
Beneath the overgrown webs, enmeshed Dorgeshi luxuries still faintly glitter.
Mykaran Magtay Village
There is little but murmurs of the wind in this village; the carefully tended terraces and farms of the Magtay are overgrown and silent.
Mykaran Eyeless Ones Village
The mud huts of the Eyeless Ones lay cocooned in fungal webs.
Mykaran Gauran Village
A skin of fungal growths lies over the entire Gauran village, including the now-silent arena.
Mykaran Geldirus Village
No sign of the Geldrius' bleak settlement of branch and bone can be seen beneath the thick mycelial web.
Mykaran Haunts Village
Wraith-like haunts can still be seen wandering over their overgrown former home.
Mykaran Hurnas Village
An untouched Hurnas settlement is little more than a barren camp, and its overgrown form is no more impressive.
Mykaran Jotus Village
The ferocious roars of the two-headed Tetike can be heard no more in this overgrown village.
Mykaran Kazanji Village
The overgrown Kazanji village is a no longer a place of fear and fire.
Mykaran Nidya Village
A great feeling of peace has settled on the overgrown Nidya settlement.
Mykaran Silics Village
The angular slopes of the Silics settlement are draped in mycelial webs, eerie and silent.
Mykaran Sisters of Mercy Village
Both the healer's square and the small gaol of the Sisters' village are covered in a fine blanket of mycelial filaments.
Mykaran Urces Village
The pits and hovels of the Urces' overgrown hamlet stand in deathly silence.
